TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable SoundPlayer extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class SoundPlayer Inherits Component Implements ISerializable
type SoundPlayer = class inherit Component interface ISerializable

summary.span: 控制 .wav 檔音效的播放。

span.span: Controls playback of a sound from a .wav file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供一個簡單的介面，來載入和播放.wav 檔案。The class provides a simple interface for loading and playing a .wav file. 類別支援的檔案路徑，URL 中，從載入.wav 檔案包含.wav 檔案或內嵌的資源包含.wav 檔案。The class supports loading a .wav file from a file path, a URL, a that contains a .wav file, or an embedded resource that contains a .wav file. 若要播放音效使用類別中，設定以.wav 檔案，並在其中一種播放方法的呼叫路徑。To play a sound using the class, configure a with a path to the .wav file and call one of the play methods. 您可以識別.wav 檔案播放使用其中一種建構函式，或藉由設定 或屬性。You can identify the .wav file to play by using one of the constructors or by setting either the or property. 可以使用其中一種負載方法播放之前載入的檔案，或可以延後載入，直到其中一種播放方法呼叫。The file can be loaded prior to playing by using one of the load methods, or loading can be deferred until one of the play methods is called. A設定為載入中的.wav 檔案或 URL 必須.wav 檔案載入記憶體之前開始播放。A configured to load a .wav file from a or URL must load the .wav file into memory before playback begins. 您可以載入或播放.wav 檔案，以同步或非同步。You can load or play a .wav file synchronously or asynchronously. 如果您呼叫同步的負載，或播放方法，呼叫的執行緒會等到方法傳回時，可能會導致中斷的繪製和其他事件。If you call a synchronous load or play method, the calling thread will wait until the method returns, which may cause painting and other events to be interrupted. 呼叫非同步載入或播放方法可讓呼叫執行緒能夠繼續使用不中斷。Calling an asynchronous load or play method will allow the calling thread to continue without interruption. 如需非同步方法呼叫的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 在背景執行作業](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md)。For more information on asynchronous method calls, see [How to: Run an Operation in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md). 當已完成載入.wav 檔案，便會產生事件。When a has finished loading a .wav file, it raises the event. 您可以檢查在事件處理常式來判斷是否載入成功或失敗。You can examine the in your event handler to determine if the load succeeded or failed. 音訊的來源設定為新的檔案路徑或 URL 時，就會引發事件。The event is raised when the audio source is set to a new file path or URL. 音訊的來源設定為新時，就會引發事件。The event is raised when the audio source is set to a new . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 如需有關，請參閱[SoundPlayer 類別概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/soundplayer-class-overview.md)。For more information about , see [SoundPlayer Class Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/soundplayer-class-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 類別不能播放其他檔案類型，例如.wma 或.mp3。The class cannot play other file types, such as .wma or .mp3. 如果您想要播放其他檔案類型，您可以使用 Windows Media Player 控制項。If you want to play other file types, you can use the Windows Media Player control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[在.NET Framework 方案中使用 Windows Media Player 控制項](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131267)和[Windows Media Player 物件模型參考適用於 Visual Basic.NET 和 C#](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131269) Windows Media Player SDK 中.For more information, see [Using the Windows Media Player Control in a .NET Framework Solution](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131267) and [Windows Media Player Object Model Reference for Visual Basic .NET and C#](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131269) in the Windows Media Player SDK. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用播放.wav 檔案從本機路徑或統一資源識別元 (URI) 的類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class for playing .wav files from a local path or a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化但沒有音訊的來源。This constructor initializes a with no audio source. 設定與音訊的來源路徑，直到會播放嗶聲音效其中一個播放方法呼叫時。Until it is configured with an audio source path, the will play a beep sound when one of its playback methods is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞至`stream`參數應該是包含.wav 檔案。The passed to the `stream` parameter should be a containing a .wav file. 所傳回的資料方法應該是.wav 檔案內的資料。The data returned by the method of the should be the data within a .wav file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將字串傳遞至`soundLocation`參數可以是檔案路徑或.wav 檔案的 URL。The string passed to the `soundLocation` parameter can be either a file path or a URL to a .wav file. 如果路徑或 URL 不正確，仍會在負載的建構，但後續呼叫，或播放方法將會失敗。If the path or URL is not valid, the will still be constructed, but subsequent calls to a load or play method will fail.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load() cil managed

summary.span: 同步載入音效。

span.span: Loads a sound synchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用目前的執行緒載入.wav 檔案，防止執行緒處理其他訊息，直到負載已完成。The method uses the current thread to load a .wav file, preventing the thread from handling other messages until the load is complete. > [!CAUTION] > 方法可能產生延遲載入大型.wav 檔案時發生。The method may produce a delay while loading a large .wav file. 此外，在載入完成之前，都會被封鎖繪製和其他事件。In addition, painting and other events will be blocked until the load is completed. 使用以非同步方式載入音效，可讓呼叫執行緒能夠繼續使用不中斷的方法。Use the method to load a sound asynchronously, which allows the calling thread to continue without interruption. 這個方法會引發事件載入時完成，即使負載不成功。This method raises the event when loading completes, even if the load was not successful. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以將.wav 檔案附加至執行個體的類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to attach a .wav file to an instance of the class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#2)]

span.span: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 使用新的執行緒，從資料流或 Web 資源載入 .wav 檔。

span.span: Loads a .wav file from a stream or a Web resource using a new thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設定為載入中的.wav 檔案或 Web 資源，這個方法會開始使用新的執行緒從位置載入.wav 檔案。If a is configured to load a .wav file from a or Web resource, this method begins loading a .wav file from the location using a new thread. 這個方法會引發事件載入時完成，即使負載不成功。This method raises the event when loading completes, even if the load was not successful. 如果已載入的.wav 檔案從本機檔案路徑，這個方法不會執行任何動作，因為會延後載入，直到播放開始。If a is configured to load a .wav file from a local file path, this method does nothing, because loading is deferred until playing begins. 如需非同步載入的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 載入音效以非同步方式在 Windows Form 中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-load-a-sound-asynchronously-within-a-windows-form.md)。For more information about asynchronous loading, see [How to: Load a Sound Asynchronously within a Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-load-a-sound-asynchronously-within-a-windows-form.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以非同步方式載入.wav 檔案以供使用的執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to asynchronously load a .wav file for use by an instance of the class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadCompleted As AsyncCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 當.wav 檔載入成功或載入失敗時都會發生。

span.span: Occurs when a .wav file has been successfully or unsuccessfully loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .Wav 檔案載入完成時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised when loading of a .wav file is complete. 事件引數，表示是否已順利完成或失敗的聲音負載。The event arguments indicate whether the load of the sound was completed successfully or failed. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件處理常式以接收通知，指出已載入.wav 檔案的內容。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event handler to receive a notification indicating that the contents of a .wav file have been loaded. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int LoadTimeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.LoadTimeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定時間，以毫秒為單位，表示 .wav 檔載入所須的時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the time, in milliseconds, in which the .wav file must load.
The number of milliseconds to wait.
The default is 10000 (10 seconds).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個時間已經過期之後，已取消載入和擲回例外狀況。After this time has expired, the loading is canceled and a exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnLoadCompleted(class System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs e) cil managed

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .Wav 檔案載入完成時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when loading of a .wav file is complete. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法是新的音效來源路徑時這個已設定。This method is called when a new audio source path for this has been set. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 如何： 提供事件的功能和[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see How to: Provide Event functionality and [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當新時，會呼叫這個方法音訊來源已設定。This method is called when a new audio source for this has been set. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Play() cil managed

summary.span: 使用新執行緒播放 .wav 檔，如果 .wav 檔還未載入則先將其載入。

span.span: Plays the .wav file using a new thread, and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會播放聲音使用新的執行緒。The method plays the sound using a new thread. 如果您呼叫.wav 檔案載入到記憶體之前，.wav 檔案將會開始播放之前載入。If you call before the .wav file has been loaded into memory, the .wav file will be loaded before playback starts. 您可以使用或預先載入至記憶體.wav 檔案的方法。You can use the or method to load the .wav file to memory in advance. 之後.wav 檔案成功載入從或 to 播放方法的後續呼叫 URL不需要重新載入.wav 檔案，直到音效變更路徑。After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a or URL, future calls to playback methods for the will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes. 如果尚未指定.wav 檔案或無法載入，方法將會播放預設的嗶聲音效。If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the method will play the default beep sound. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以非同步方式播放.wav 檔案的方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to asynchronously play a .wav file. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PlayLooping() cil managed

summary.span: 使用新執行緒重複循環播放 .wav 檔，如果 .wav 檔還未載入則先將其載入。

span.span: Plays and loops the .wav file using a new thread, and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法播放及迴圈使用新的執行緒的聲音。The method plays and loops the sound using a new thread. 如果您呼叫.wav 檔案載入到記憶體之前，.wav 檔案將會開始播放之前載入。If you call before the .wav file has been loaded into memory, the .wav file will be loaded before playback starts. 您可以使用或預先載入至記憶體.wav 檔案的方法。You can use the or method to load the .wav file to memory in advance. 之後.wav 檔案成功載入從或 to 播放方法的後續呼叫 URL不需要重新載入.wav 檔案，直到音效變更路徑。After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a or URL, future calls to playback methods for the will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes. 如果尚未指定.wav 檔案或無法載入，方法將會播放預設的嗶聲音效。If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the method will play the default beep sound. 如需有關，請參閱[How to： 循環播放 Windows Form 上播放的聲音](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-loop-a-sound-playing-on-a-windows-form.md)。For more information about , see [How to: Loop a Sound Playing on a Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-loop-a-sound-playing-on-a-windows-form.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用重複播放.wav 檔案的方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to repeatedly play a .wav file. 直到播放.wav方法呼叫。The .wav will be played until the method is called. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#6)]

exception.span: 載入時耗用的時間超過了 所指定的時間 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by .

exception.span: 找不到 指定的檔案。

span.span: The file specified by cannot be found.

exception.span: .wav 標頭損毀， 指定的檔案不是 PCM .wav 檔。

span.span: The .wav header is corrupted; the file specified by is not a PCM .wav file.

Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PlaySync() cil managed

summary.span: 播放 .wav 檔案，如果 .wav 檔案還未載入則先將其載入。

span.span: Plays the .wav file and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用目前的執行緒以播放.wav 檔案，防止執行緒處理其他訊息，直到負載已完成。The method uses the current thread to play a .wav file, preventing the thread from handling other messages until the load is complete. 您可以使用或預先載入至記憶體.wav 檔案的方法。You can use the or method to load the .wav file to memory in advance. 之後.wav 檔案成功載入從或 to 播放方法的後續呼叫 URL不需要重新載入.wav 檔案，直到音效變更路徑。After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a or URL, future calls to playback methods for the will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes. 如果尚未指定.wav 檔案或無法載入，方法將會播放預設的嗶聲音效。If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the method will play the default beep sound. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用同步播放.wav 檔案的方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to synchronously play a .wav file. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync/CPP/system.windows.forms.sound.playasync.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync/CS/system.windows.forms.sound.playasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync/VB/system.windows.forms.sound.playasync.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會引發這個事件的新的音效來源路徑時這個已設定。This event is raised when a new audio source path for this has been set. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用接收通知的事件處理常式時已附加到不同的.wav 檔案。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event handler to receive a notification when the has been attached to a different .wav file. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#9)]
